# Arshveer Gahir - Portfolio

> Personal portfolio of Arshveer (Veer) Gahir, a product-focused ML/AI Engineer specializing in enterprise AI solutions.

## Pages

- [Home](/): Overview, tech stack, and featured projects
- [Projects](/projects): Full portfolio of AI/ML projects
- [Resume](/resume): Professional resume and experience
- [Contact](/contact): Contact information and appointment booking
- [FAQ](/faq): Frequently asked questions for employers, co-workers, and clients

## Featured Projects

- [ruh](/ruh): AI Product Safety Analyzer - Chrome extension for analyzing product ingredients
  - [Privacy Policy](/ruh/privacy): ruh privacy policy and data handling practices
- [Capfluence](https://capfluence.com): AI-powered lead discovery platform for financial advisors
- [Highlyte](https://highlyte.com): Compliance & risk management using computer vision and NLP

## Expertise

- ML/AI Engineering
- Product Development
- Computer Vision & NLP
- Cloud Architecture
